text: Riccardo Garrone (1 January 1926 - 14 March 2016) was an Italian movie actor. He appeared in over 150 movies since 1949. He worked in comedy movies. He was known for his roles in La Dolce Vita, The Dinner, and in Girl with a Suitcase. Garrone died in Milan, Italy on 14 March 2016 from heart failure. title: Riccardo Garrone
